class.name: TextServerFallback
class.brief_description: A fallback implementation of Godot's text server, without support for BiDi and complex text layout.
class.description: A fallback implementation of Godot's text server. This fallback is faster than [TextServerAdvanced] for processing a lot of text, but it does not support BiDi and complex text layout. [b]Note:[/b] This text server is not part of official Godot binaries. If you want to use it, compile the engine with the option [code]module_text_server_fb_enabled=yes[/code]. When building with [TextServerFallback], consider also disabling [TextServerAdvanced] with [code]module_text_server_adv_enabled=no[/code] to reduce binary size.
